content:
Diagnosis:

Metastatic apocrine breast carcinoma
Initial diagnosis March 2023 - right breast T4N2M0 disease
AR positive, ER/PR negative, HER2 positive (3+), Ki67 60%

Previous Treatment:
Neoadjuvant TCHP completed August 2023
Right mastectomy September 2023
Adjuvant radiotherapy completed December 2023
Maintenance Trastuzumab/Pertuzumab

Disease Status:
CT January 2024 - multiple new bone metastases
MRI spine shows T4,T7,L2 vertebral involvement
Rising CA15-3 from 45 to 180

Current Situation:
PS 2 due to increasing bone pain
Requiring regular opioid analgesia
Progressive fatigue limiting daily activities

Plan:
Discontinue maintenance Trastuzumab/Pertuzumab
Commence T-DM1 with monthly denosumab
Urgent referral for palliative radiotherapy to T4 vertebra
Review in 3 weeks with treatment response assessment

I reviewed [redacted name] today who has unfortunately shown clear evidence of disease progression on maintenance HER2-directed therapy. After discussing options, we have agreed to switch to second-line T-DM1. I have explained the common side effects and monitoring requirements. She understands to contact us if experiencing any new symptoms or concerns. We will arrange urgent palliative radiotherapy to the symptomatic thoracic vertebra.
